titles.ar: بَابُ الِاشْتِغَالِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ
titles.en: Chapter 24 – The pre-occupation with the Zikr (mentioning) of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic

titles.ar: بَابُ الِاشْتِغَالِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ
titles.en: Chapter 24 – The pre-occupation with the Zikr (mentioning) of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ يَقُولُ مَنْ شُغِلَ بِذِكْرِي عَنْ مَسْأَلَتِي أَعْطَيْتُهُ أَفْضَلَ مَا أُعْطِي مَنْ سَأَلَنِي .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hisham Bin Salim, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic is Saying: “The one who is too pre-occupied by (doing) Myazwj Zikr (and) does not ask (for his needs), Iazwj shall Give him even more than the one who asks Meazwj (his needs)”’.

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنْ مَنْصُورِ بْنِ يُونُسَ عَنْ هَارُونَ بْنِ خَارِجَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِنَّ الْعَبْدَ لَيَكُونُ لَهُ الْحَاجَةُ إِلَى اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فَيَبْدَأُ بِالثَّنَاءِ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَ الصَّلَاةِ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ حَتَّى يَنْسَى حَاجَتَهُ فَيَقْضِيهَا اللَّهُ لَهُ مِنْ غَيْرِ أَنْ يَسْأَلَهُ إِيَّاهَا .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Mansour Bin Yunus, from Haroun Bin Kharjat, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘The servant happens to have the need for him to Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic. So he begins with the Laudation upon Allahazwj and the Salawāt upon Muhammadsaww and the Progenyasws of Muhammadsaww until he forgets his need. So Allahazwj would Fulfil it for him from without him having asked Himazwj for it’.
